body:
Herro guys, it's been a long time. I've appealed and successfully appealed. I am wondering where my diamond rank is also. I am currently gold right now. :L

Edit: Don't try to bring up a fight and/or say anything about me.

replies.body: I see your infracions, and most/all of them happened between... 1 hour to 7 days. Also, I knew it was stupid of me, so, I just appealed, because I wanted to come back to the community. It seems that I might leave though. There are problems already that I will not mention. Note that you've broke multiple rules multiple times. I've only attempted in a frame of a jr. mod cussing at me. That was pretty much the main reason I was banned (or, I think so, as of what people are telling me).
